name: E-commerce Platform MVP
description: Build a complete e-commerce platform with backend API and customer-facing UI

backend.title: Product Catalog API
backend.spec: REST API for managing products, categories, and inventory

backend.title: Order Management API
backend.spec: REST API for order processing, payment integration, and fulfillment

ui.title: Customer Storefront UI
ui.spec: React-based storefront with product browsing, cart, and checkout

ui.title: Admin Dashboard UI
ui.spec: Admin panel for managing products, orders, and customers
